# ::snt Since there is responsibility, we are not afraid. The territory is small, but it is related to the matter of dignity; no matter how the winds and clouds changes, the interests of the country and national unity are the guarantee of honor; even though scarred with wounds, we can not let our native lands be separated!
# ::save-date Wed Apr 15, 2015 ::file bolt12_6455_6561_15.txt
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (c / cause-01
            :ARG0 (r / responsible-02)
            :ARG1 (f / fear-01 :polarity -
                  :ARG0 (w / we)))
      :snt2 (h2 / have-concession-91
            :ARG1 (r2 / relate-01
                  :ARG1 t
                  :ARG2 (m2 / matter
                        :topic (d / dignity)))
            :ARG2 (s / small
                  :domain (t / territory)))
      :snt3 (g / guarantee-01
            :ARG0 (i / interest
                  :poss (a / and
                        :op1 (c3 / country)
                        :op2 (u / unity
                              :mod (n / nation))))
            :ARG1 (h / honor)
            :concession (t2 / thing
                  :manner-of (c4 / change-01
                        :ARG1 (a2 / and
                              :op1 (w2 / wind)
                              :op2 (c2 / cloud)))))
      :snt4 (p / possible-01 :polarity -
            :ARG1 (l / let-01
                  :ARG0 (w3 / we)
                  :ARG1 (s2 / separate-01
                        :ARG1 (l2 / land
                              :poss w3
                              :mod (n3 / native)))
                  :concession (s3 / scar-01
                        :ARG1 l2
                        :manner (w4 / wound-01
                              :ARG1 l2)))))

# ::save-date Fri Mar 13, 2015 ::file bolt12_6455_6561_16.txt

      :ARG0 i
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (m2 / mean-01
                  :ARG1 (a2 / advent
                        :mod (d / date-entity :century 21))
                  :ARG2 (t / time
                        :time-of (c4 / contrast-01
                              :ARG1 (b / beset-01
                                    :ARG0 (d2 / difficulty)
                                    :ARG1 w
                                    :location (i2 / inside))
                              :ARG2 (p / press-01
                                    :ARG1 w
                                    :source (o / outside))))
                  :ARG3 (n / nation
                        :mod (c3 / country :wiki "China" :name (n2 / name :op1 "China"))))

                  :ARG0 (w / we)
                  :ARG1 (t2 / thing
                        :quant (m / many)
                        :ARG2-of (c2 / challenge-01
                              :ARG1 w))))
      :ARG2 (c / citizen
            :mod (f / fellow)
            :poss (i / i)))

                  :mod (b / block)))

            :ARG1 s

      :ARG0 (t / they)
      :ARG1 (r / respect-01
            :ARG0 t
            :ARG1 (y / you)
            :degree (m / more))
      :time (s2 / start-01
            :ARG0 t
            :ARG1 (r2 / realize-01
                  :ARG0 t
                  :ARG1 (b / bend-01 :polarity -
                        :ARG1 y
                        :mod (o / over)
                        :direction (b2 / backwards)
                        :beneficiary t))))

                        :ARG1 l2

                                    :ARG0 i))
                        :time (a5 / always)))
            :time (s4 / since
                  :op1 (m4 / move-01
                        :ARG1 i

                              :mod (s3 / secondary)))))

                  :op1 (t / temporal-quantity :quant 15
                        :unit (m / month)))))

                              :mod (n / new)))

# ::id DF-200-192400-625_7046.11 ::date 2013-09-07T12:17:56 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Most people feel unintelligent and awkward when they first get to uni- you're definitely not alone there. But I would really recommend that you get an appointment with your uni counselling services. It doesn't really matter whether anyone has told you that you are depressed or not, you are obviously having some problems at the minute and could use some support- labels aren't as important as your experiences. Meditation and exercise are really helpful, so definitely try to do those. But yeah, you will have to engage with help and life in general to get somewhere- but don't beat yourself up about feeling unmotivated to do anything at the minute, lots of people feel like this and hopefully it will pass as you begin to feel better. Being unkind to yourself will only make you feel worse- be kind to yourself and get some help.
# ::save-date Thu Jul 30, 2015 ::file DF-200-192400-625_7046_11.txt
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (f / feel-01
            :ARG0 (p / person
                  :quant (m2 / most))
            :ARG1 (a / and
                  :op1 (i / intelligent-01 :polarity -
                        :ARG1 p)
                  :op2 (a2 / awkward))
            :time (g / get-05
                  :ARG1 p
                  :ARG2 (u / university)
                  :ord (o5 / ordinal-entity :value 1))
            :ARG0-of (c3 / cause-01
                  :ARG1 (a4 / alone :polarity -
                        :domain (y / you)
                        :location u
                        :mod (d / definite))))
      :snt2 (c / contrast-01
            :ARG2 (r / recommend-01
                  :ARG0 (i2 / i)
                  :ARG1 (g2 / get-01
                        :ARG0 (y2 / you)
                        :ARG1 (a5 / appointment-02
                              :ARG0 y2
                              :ARG1 (s / service
                                    :ARG0-of (c2 / counsel-01
                                          :ARG1 y)
                                    :location (u2 / university
                                          :poss y))))
                  :ARG2 y2
                  :mod (r2 / really)))
      :snt3 (m3 / matter-01 :polarity -

                  :ARG0 (a3 / anyone)
                  :ARG1 (o / or
                        :op1 (d2 / depress-01
                              :ARG1 y3)

                              :ARG1 y3))

                  :ARG0 (y4 / you)

                        :quant (s2 / some))

                              :ARG1 y4
                              :mod (s4 / some)))))

            :mod (r4 / really)

      :mod (g / good))

# ::id DF-200-192400-625_7046.13 ::date 2013-09-07T11:28:40 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt I think a lot more people feel the same way as you do, but medicate themselves by using friends. Whilst it probably isn't a 'solution' as such, being around friends whilst being depressed is definitely better than being alone and being depressed. Either way, if you fancy a chat, feel free to PM
# ::save-date Mon Apr 27, 2015 ::file DF-200-192400-625_7046_13.txt
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (t / think-01
            :ARG0 (i / i)

                  :ARG1 (f / feel-01
                        :ARG0 (p / person
                              :quant (l / lot
                                    :degree (m2 / more)))
                        :ARG1 (w / way
                              :ARG1-of (s / same-01
                                    :ARG2 (f2 / feel-01
                                          :ARG0 (y / you)))))
                  :ARG2 (m3 / medicate-01
                        :ARG0 p
                        :ARG1 p
                        :manner (u / use-01
                              :ARG0 p
                              :ARG1 (p4 / person
                                    :ARG0-of (h2 / have-rel-role-91
                                          :ARG1 p
                                          :ARG2 (f3 / friend)))))))
      :snt2 (c2 / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (s2 / solution :polarity -
                  :mod (a / as-such)
                  :domain b
                  :mod (p3 / probable))
            :ARG2 (g / good-02
                  :ARG1 (b / be-located-at-91
                        :ARG1 (y2 / you)
                        :ARG2 (a2 / around
                              :op1 (p5 / person
                                    :ARG0-of (h3 / have-rel-role-91
                                          :ARG1 y2
                                          :ARG2 (f4 / friend))))
                        :time (d / depress-01
                              :ARG1 y2))
                  :degree (m4 / more)
                  :compared-to (a3 / and
                        :op1 (a4 / alone
                              :domain y2)
                        :op2 d)
                  :mod (d2 / definite)))
      :snt3 (h / have-condition-91
            :ARG1 (f5 / feel-01
                  :ARG0 (y3 / you)
                  :ARG1 (f6 / free-04
                        :ARG1 y3
                        :ARG3 (p2 / PM)))
            :ARG2 (f7 / fancy-02
                  :ARG0 y3
                  :ARG1 (c3 / chat-01
                        :ARG0 y3))
            :mod (w2 / way
                  :mod (e / either))))

# ::id DF-200-192400-625_7046.14 ::date 2013-09-07T11:33:11 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                  :domain i))

            :ARG0 (y2 / you)
            :ARG1 (s / someone
                  :example (s2 / someone
                        :ARG1-of (c / come-03
                              :ARG2 (b / background
                                    :ARG1-of (b2 / bad-07)))
                        :ARG1-of (e / end-up-03
                              :ARG2 (a2 / and
                                    :op1 (s3 / succeed-01
                                          :ARG0 s2)
                                    :op2 (h / happy
                                          :domain s2)

                                          :ARG0 s2
                                          :ARG1 (f2 / family))
                                    :op4 (m2 / marry-01
                                          :ARG1 s2)
                                    :op5 (e2 / et-cetera))))))
      :snt3 (c3 / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (w / want-01 :polarity -
                  :ARG0 (y3 / you)
                  :ARG1 (t / they
                        :domain y3))
            :ARG2 (s4 / someone
                  :ARG1-of (a3 / admire-01
                        :ARG0 y3)
                  :ARG1-of (r / respect-01
                        :ARG0 y3))))

# ::id DF-200-192400-625_7046.16 ::date 2013-09-08T08:31:17 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                              :ARG1 y
                              :ARG2 (t2 / there)))))

            :ARG0 y
            :ARG1 (b2 / bottom
                  :poss y)
            :ARG2 (o / off)
            :purpose (g / get-01
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 (g2 / grade
                        :mod (g3 / good
                              :degree (m / most)
                              :ARG1-of (p / possible-01)))))

            :ARG0 (h / have-03
                  :ARG0 y

                        :ARG1-of (s3 / say-01
                              :ARG0 y
                              :ARG1-of (p2 / possible-01))
                        :example (a2 / and
                              :op1 (f / fail-01 :polarity -
                                    :ARG1 (i / i)
                                    :mod (h2 / hey :mode expressive))
                              :op2 (a3 / and
                                    :op1 (w2 / work-01
                                          :ARG1 (i2 / it)
                                          :ARG1-of (h3 / hard-02))
                                    :op2 (p3 / pass-07
                                          :ARG1 i))))
                  :time (g4 / get-01
                        :ARG0 y
                        :ARG1 (d / degree
                              :poss y))))
      :mod (w3 / way
            :mod (e / either)))

# ::id DF-200-192400-625_7200.1 ::date 2013-09-05T19:38:56 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt I'm pretty much non-autistic (not diagnosed with dyspraxia but I think the doctor misdiagnosed), but I walk on my toes nearly all of the time.
# ::save-date Tue Mar 10, 2015 ::file DF-200-192400-625_7200_1.txt
(c / contrast-01
      :ARG1 (a / autistic :polarity -
            :ARG1-of (m / mean-01
                  :ARG2 (d4 / diagnose-01 :polarity -
                        :ARG1 i
                        :ARG2 (d2 / dyspraxia)
                        :ARG1-of (c2 / contrast-01
                              :ARG2 (t / think-01
                                    :ARG0 i
                                    :ARG1 (m2 / misdiagnose-01
                                          :ARG0 (d3 / doctor))))))
            :degree (p / pretty-much)
            :domain (i / i))
      :ARG2 (w / walk-01
            :ARG0 i
            :prep-on (t2 / toe
                  :part-of i)
            :frequency (t3 / time
                  :quant (n / nearly
                        :op1 (a2 / all)))))

# ::id DF-200-192400-625_7200.2 ::date 2013-09-05T23:22:32 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :ARG0 (i2 / it)
      :ARG1 (i / i)
      :degree (m / more))

# ::id DF-200-192400-625_7200.3 ::date 2013-09-06T00:06:29 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt What made them decide toe-walking is a sign of autism since it seems so random and isn't always indicative?
# ::save-date Sun Sep 15, 2013 ::file DF-200-192400-625_7200_3.txt
(m / make-02
      :ARG0 (a / amr-unknown)
      :ARG1 (d / decide-01
            :ARG0 (t / they)
            :ARG1 (s / signal-07
                  :ARG0 (w / walk-01
                        :manner (t2 / toe))
                  :ARG1 (a2 / autism)))
      :ARG1-of (c / cause-01
            :ARG0 (a3 / and
                  :op1 (s2 / seem-01
                        :ARG1 (r / random
                              :degree (s3 / so)
                              :domain w))
                  :op2 (i / indicate-01 :polarity -
                        :ARG0 w
                        :time (a4 / always)))))

# ::id DF-200-192400-625_7200.4 ::date 2013-09-06T00:13:18 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                        :ARG0-of (s / signal-07
                              :ARG1 (s2 / something
                                    :location (s3 / spectrum
                                          :mod (a / autism)))))))
      :ARG2 (h2 / have-03 :polarity -
            :ARG0 (a2 / amr-unknown)
            :ARG1 (o2 / or
                  :op1 (t2 / thing :quant 1
                        :ARG0-of s)
                  :op2 (t3 / thing :quant 2
                        :ARG0-of s)))
      :mod (w / well))

# ::id DF-200-192400-625_7200.8 ::date 2013-09-06T00:33:00 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Feeling tired a lot can be a symptom of leukaemia.
# ::save-date Fri Sep 6, 2013 ::file DF-200-192400-625_7200_8.txt
(p / possible-01
      :ARG1 (s / symptom
            :mod (l / leukaemia)
            :domain (f / feel-01
                  :ARG1 (t / tire-01
                        :frequency (l2 / lot)))))

# ::id DF-200-192400-625_7200.9 ::date 2013-09-06T00:34:31 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Symptoms don't always apply but if they happen in a lot of cases (which it clearly must do in this instance) it's worth noting, since otherwise nothing would ever get diagnosed.
# ::save-date Fri May 29, 2015 ::file DF-200-192400-625_7200_9.txt
(c / contrast-01
      :ARG1 (a / apply-02 :polarity -
            :ARG0 (s / symptom)
            :time (a2 / always))
      :ARG2 (r / recommend-01
            :ARG1 (n / note-01)
            :condition (s2 / symptom
                  :frequency (c2 / case
                        :quant (l / lot))
                  :ARG1-of (i / infer-01
                        :topic (i2 / instance
                              :mod (t / this))
                        :ARG1-of (c3 / clear-06)))
            :ARG0-of (c4 / cause-01
                  :ARG1 (d2 / diagnose-01
                        :ARG2 (n2 / nothing)
                        :time (e / ever)
                        :condition (n3 / note-01 :polarity -)))))

# ::id DF-200-192400-625_7200.10 ::date 2013-09-06T00:42:55 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt I used to walk on my toes, but that was because I was born with strange toes that curled under and had to be straightened with surgery two years ago.
# ::save-date Wed Jul 29, 2015 ::file DF-200-192400-625_7200_10.txt

      :ARG1 (w / walk-01
            :ARG0 (i / i)
            :prep-on (t2 / toe
                  :part-of i))
      :ARG2 (c / cause-01
            :ARG0 (b / bear-02
                  :ARG1 i
                  :prep-with (t3 / toe
                        :mod (s / strange)
                        :ARG1-of (c2 / curl-01
                              :ARG2 (u / under))
                        :ARG1-of (s2 / straighten-01
                              :ARG2 (s3 / surgery-01)
                              :ARG2-of (o / obligate-01)
                              :time (b2 / before
                                    :op1 (n / now)
                                    :quant (t4 / temporal-quantity :quant 2
                                          :unit (y2 / year))))))
            :ARG1 w))

# ::id DF-200-192400-625_7200.11 ::date 2013-09-06T00:47:45 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt My brother's autistic but I haven't noticed this with him either, but the spectrum is so broad and I myself probably have mild asperger's because I have problems with communication and don't pick up on social reactions/body language.
# ::save-date Sat Jul 25, 2015 ::file DF-200-192400-625_7200_11.txt
(c / contrast-01
      :ARG1 (c2 / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (a / autistic
                  :domain (p4 / person

                              :ARG1 (i / i)
                              :ARG2 (b / brother))))
            :ARG2 (n / notice-01 :polarity -
                  :ARG0 i
                  :ARG1 a
                  :mod (e / either)))
      :ARG2 (a2 / and
            :op1 (b2 / broad-02
                  :ARG1 (s2 / spectrum)
                  :degree (s / so))
            :op2 (p / probable
                  :domain (h2 / have-03
                        :ARG0 i
                        :ARG1 (d / disease :wiki "Asperger_syndrome" :name (n2 / name :op1 "Asperger's")
                              :mod (m2 / mild))
                        :ARG0-of (c3 / cause-01
                              :ARG1 (a5 / and
                                    :op1 (h / have-03
                                          :ARG0 i
                                          :ARG1 (p2 / problem
                                                :topic (c4 / communicate-01)))
                                    :op2 (p3 / pick-up-11 :polarity -
                                          :ARG0 i
                                          :ARG1 (s4 / slash
                                                :op1 (r / react-01
                                                      :mod (s3 / society))
                                                :op2 (l / language
                                                      :mod (b3 / body))))))))))

                                                      :ARG0 i2)))))))))

                        :mod (l / last))))

            :ARG1 h

                  :op1 (n / now)
                  :quant (f / few
                        :op1 (t3 / temporal-quantity :quant 1
                              :unit (m4 / month))))))

# ::id DF-200-192400-625_7744.1 ::date 2013-09-07T05:47:00 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt So I think Ive got a form of OCD because for the past year, I've found that everytime I go out, especially to Uni, I'm always checking my belongings to make sure I haven't lost or left anything.
# ::save-date Fri Jul 24, 2015 ::file DF-200-192400-625_7744_1.txt
(c / cause-01
      :ARG0 (f / find-01
            :ARG0 (i / i)
            :ARG1 (c2 / check-01
                  :ARG0 i
                  :ARG1 (t / thing
                        :ARG0-of (b / belong-01
                              :ARG1 i))
                  :time (a / always)
                  :purpose (e2 / ensure-01
                        :ARG0 i
                        :ARG1 (o / or
                              :op1 (l / lose-02 :polarity -
                                    :ARG0 i
                                    :ARG1 (a2 / anything))
                              :op2 (l2 / leave-behind-18 :polarity -
                                    :ARG0 i
                                    :ARG1 a2)))
                  :frequency (r / rate-entity-91
                        :ARG4 (g2 / go-out-17
                              :ARG0 i
                              :direction (u / university
                                    :mod (e / especially)))))
            :time (y / year
                  :mod (p / past)))
      :ARG1 (t3 / think-01
            :ARG0 i
            :ARG1 (g / get-02
                  :ARG0 i
                  :ARG1 (d / disease :wiki "Obsessivecompulsive_disorder" :name (n / name :op1 "OCD")
                        :mod (f2 / form)))
            :mod (s / so)))

# ::id DF-200-192400-625_7744.2 ::date 2013-09-07T06:04:42 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt I often have to check twice at one go, then after 30 seconds for some reason I cant resist checking again!
# ::save-date Sat Jan 10, 2015 ::file DF-200-192400-625_7744_2.txt
(a3 / and
      :op1 (o / obligate-01
            :ARG1 (i / i)
            :ARG2 (c / check-01
                  :ARG0 i
                  :frequency (r3 / rate-entity-91
                        :ARG1 2
                        :ARG4 (g / go :quant 1)))
            :frequency (o2 / often))
      :op2 (p / possible-01 :polarity -
            :ARG1 (r / resist-01
                  :ARG0 i
                  :ARG1 (c3 / check-01
                        :ARG0 i
                        :mod (a / again)))
            :time (a2 / after

                        :unit (s / second)))
            :time (t2 / then)
            :ARG1-of (c4 / cause-01
                  :ARG0 (r2 / reason
                        :mod (s2 / some)))))

# ::id DF-200-192400-625_7744.7 ::date 2013-09-07T08:23:49 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt If I don't check, I get very very anxious, which does sort of go away after 15-30 mins, but often the anxiety is so much that I can't wait that long.

                        :direction (a2 / away)

                                          :unit (m / minute))
                                    :op2 (t2 / temporal-quantity :quant 30
                                          :unit (m2 / minute))))))
            :condition (c2 / check-01 :polarity -
                  :ARG0 i))
      :ARG2 (a4 / anxiety
            :quant (m3 / much
                  :ARG0-of (c3 / cause-01
                        :ARG1 (p / possible-01 :polarity -
                              :ARG1 (w / wait-01
                                    :ARG1 i
                                    :ARG1-of (l / long-03
                                          :degree (t3 / that))))))
            :time (o2 / often)))

            :ARG1 (l / level
                  :mod (a / anxiety
                        :poss (y / you)))
            :duration (d / duration)))

# ::id DF-200-192400-625_7806.3 ::date 2013-09-07T13:17:09 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt I have begun to feel irrationally panicky about a variety of things which beforehand wouldn't worry me too much or even cross my mind as something to cause alarm bells to ring in my head.
# ::save-date Sat Jul 4, 2015 ::file DF-200-192400-625_7806_3.txt
(b / begin-01
      :ARG0 (i / i)
      :ARG1 (f / feel-01
            :ARG0 i
            :ARG1 (p / panic-01
                  :ARG0 (t / thing
                        :mod (v / variety)

                  :name (n2 / name :op1 "Iran")))

      :concession (l / limit-01
            :ARG1 (p / penalize-01
                  :ARG1-of (d / demand-01
                        :ARG0 (c2 / country :wiki "United_States"
                              :name (n3 / name :op1 "U.S."))))
            :ARG1-of (c3 / cause-01
                  :ARG0 (p2 / pressure-01
                        :ARG0 (a / and

                                    :name (n4 / name :op1 "China"))
                              :op1 (c5 / country :wiki "Russia"
                                    :name (n5 / name :op1 "Russia")))))))

# ::id PROXY_LTW_ENG_20070930_0021.7 ::date 2013-08-01T07:06:24 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                              :name (n / name :op1 "India"))

                              :name (n2 / name :op1 "Israel"))
                        :op3 (c4 / country :wiki "Pakistan"
                              :name (n3 / name :op1 "Pakistan"))))
            :ARG0-of (s / sign-01 :polarity -
                  :ARG1 (t / treaty :wiki "Treaty_on_the_Non-Proliferation_of_Nuclear_Weapons"
                        :name (n4 / name :op1 "Nuclear" :op2 "Non-Proliferation" :op3 "Treaty"))))
      :ARG2 (p2 / participate-01
            :ARG0 c
            :ARG1 (t2 / trade-01
                  :mod (n5 / nucleus)
                  :mod (i2 / international)
                  :ARG2-of (i3 / include-01
                        :ARG1 (p3 / purchase-01
                              :ARG1 (o / or
                                    :op1 (r / reactor)
                                    :op2 (f / fuel
                                          :mod (u / uranium))
                                    :op3 (y / yellowcake)))))))

                                          :ARG2 c2)))))))

      :ARG0 (g / government-organization :wiki "Ministry_of_Foreign_Affairs_and_International_Development_(France)" :name (n3 / name :op1 "Foreign" :op2 "Ministry")
            :mod (c / country :wiki "France" :name (n / name :op1 "France")))
      :ARG1 (t2 / thing
            :ARG1-of (s / state-01)

                  :mod (d / domestic))))

                        :mod (t2 / this)))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20020406_0118.4 ::date 2013-07-26 ::snt-type summary ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt A high-security Russian laboratory complex storing anthrax, plague and other deadly bacteria faces loosing electricity for lack of payment to the mosenergo electric utility.

      :ARG0 (c / complex
            :mod (l / laboratory)
            :mod (c2 / country :wiki "Russia" :name (n / name :op1 "Russia"))
            :mod (s / security
                  :ARG1-of (h / high-02))
            :ARG2-of (s2 / store-01
                  :ARG1 (a / and
                        :op1 (a2 / anthrax)
                        :op2 (p / plague)
                        :op3 (b / bacterium
                              :ARG0-of (k / kill-01)
                              :mod (o / other)))))
      :ARG1 (l2 / lose-02
            :ARG0 c
            :ARG1 (e / electricity))
      :ARG1-of (c3 / cause-01
            :ARG0 (l3 / lack-01
                  :ARG0 c
                  :ARG1 (p2 / pay-01
                        :ARG0 c
                        :ARG2 (u2 / utility :wiki "Mosenergo" :name (n3 / name :op1 "Mosenergo")
                              :mod (e2 / electricity))))))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20020406_0118.5 ::date 2013-08-02T07:54:30 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                        :mod (l3 / laboratory)

                        :mod (s2 / security
                              :ARG1-of (h / high-02))
                        :location (r2 / relative-position

                                    :unit (m / mile))
                              :direction (s4 / south)))))
      :ARG1 (l2 / lose-02
            :ARG0 r
            :ARG1 (e / electricity)))

                                                :ARG1 (c2 / control-01

                                                      :ARG1 c)
                                                :ARG1-of (p4 / possible-01)))))
                        :mod (o / overdue))
                  :ARG1 m)))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20050716_0171.27 ::date 2013-08-11T04:11:40 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt In May, Chavez's government announced details in 050500 of an $18.6 million deal with a Russian firm to purchase 100000 AK-103 assault rifles with 30 rounds of ammunition each and the technology transfer for Venezuela to manufacture the rifles.
# ::save-date Thu May 21, 2015 ::file PROXY_NYT_ENG_20050716_0171_27.txt
(a / announce-01
      :ARG0 (g / government-organization
            :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01)
            :poss (p / person :wiki "Hugo_Chvez" :name (n / name :op1 "Chavez")))
      :ARG1 (a2 / and
            :op1 (d5 / detail-01
                  :ARG1 (d6 / deal-01
                        :ARG0 g
                        :ARG1 (f / firm
                              :mod (c / country :wiki "Russia" :name (n2 / name :op1 "Russia")))
                        :ARG2 (p2 / purchase-01
                              :ARG0 g
                              :ARG1 (r / rifle :quant 100000 :wiki "AK-103" :name (n3 / name :op1 "AK-103")
                                    :instrument-of (a4 / assault-01)
                                    :accompanier (r2 / round :quant 30
                                          :consist-of (a5 / ammunition))
                                    :mod (e / each)))
                        :ARG3 (m2 / monetary-quantity :quant 18600000
                              :unit (d7 / dollar))))
            :op2 (t / transfer-01
                  :ARG1 (t2 / technology)
                  :ARG2 (c2 / country :wiki "Venezuela" :name (n4 / name :op1 "Venezuela"))
                  :purpose (m3 / manufacture-01
                        :ARG0 c2
                        :ARG1 r)))
      :time (d / date-entity :year 2005 :month 5))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20050716_0171.28 ::date 2013-08-11T04:33:27 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The deal works out to $186.22 per rifle.
# ::save-date Tue Sep 17, 2013 ::file PROXY_NYT_ENG_20050716_0171_28.txt
(w / work-out-05
      :ARG1 (d2 / deal-01)

(h / have-purpose-91
      :ARG1 (p / project
            :mod (n / nucleus)
            :poss (c / country :wiki "Iran"
                  :name (n2 / name :op1 "Iran")))
      :ARG2 (p3 / purpose
            :mod (p2 / peaceful)))

      :ARG1 (h / have-purpose-91
            :ARG1 (p / project
                  :mod (n4 / nucleus)
                  :poss (c3 / country :wiki "Iran"
                        :name (n5 / name :op1 "Iran")))

                        :degree (f / further)))))

                                    :ARG2 (b / build-01
                                          :ARG1 (b2 / bomb))))))
            :frequency (a / approximately :op1 75)))

      :op1 (o / offshoot

      :op2 (c / charge-05
            :ARG1 o2
            :ARG2 (m / monitor-01
                  :ARG0 o2

                        :mod (i / international))
                  :purpose (e / ensure-01
                        :ARG0 o2
                        :ARG1 (d / direct-01 :polarity -
                              :ARG1 (t3 / technology
                                    :mod (n4 / nucleus)
                                    :ARG1-of (t4 / transfer-01
                                          :purpose (p / purpose
                                                :mod (p2 / peaceful))))
                              :ARG2 (u / use-01
                                    :mod (m2 / military)))))))

# ::save-date Tue Sep 10, 2013 ::file PROXY_NYT_ENG_20071115_0274_8.txt

      :ARG0 (s2 / statement
            :mod (m / mission)
            :poss (o / organization :wiki "Nuclear_Suppliers_Group"
                  :name (n / name :op1 "Nuclear" :op2 "Suppliers" :op3 "Group")))
      :ARG1 (a / act-02
            :ARG0 (c / country)
            :manner (b / basis
                  :mod (i / individual))
            :purpose (b2 / block-01
                  :ARG0 c
                  :ARG1 (t / trade-01
                        :ARG0-of (v / violate-01
                              :ARG1 (c2 / control-01
                                    :ARG1 (e / export-01)
                                    :ARG1-of (d / devise-01
                                          :ARG2 (m2 / maintain-01
                                                :ARG0 c2
                                                :ARG1 (c3 / cooperate-01
                                                      :ARG2 (u / use-01
                                                            :ARG1 (e2 / energy
                                                                  :mod (n2 / nucleus))
                                                            :mod (p / peaceful))
                                                      :mod (i2 / international))))))))))

                                    :poss o))))))

            :ARG0 o
            :manner (s / secret
                  :degree (l / large))))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20071115_0274.11 ::date 2013-08-05T01:05:44 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Tue Sep 10, 2013 ::file PROXY_NYT_ENG_20071115_0274_11.txt
(a / and
      :op1 (b / be-temporally-at-91
            :ARG1 (d / deny-01
                  :ARG1 (p / purchase-01)
                  :quant (m / most)
                  :ARG1-of (i / include-91
                        :ARG2 (d2 / deny-01)))
            :ARG2 (s / since
                  :op1 (d3 / date-entity :year 2002)))
      :op2 (r / result-01
            :ARG1 (i2 / intervene-01
                  :ARG0 (c / country
                        :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                              :ARG1 (o2 / organization :wiki "Nuclear_Suppliers_Group"
                                    :name (n2 / name :op1 "Nuclear" :op2 "Suppliers" :op3 "Group"))
                              :ARG2 (m2 / member))))
            :ARG2 d))

# ::save-date Fri Aug 9, 2013 ::file PROXY_NYT_ENG_20080808_0162_17.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (p / person :wiki "Vladimir_Putin"
            :name (n / name :op1 "Vladimir" :op2 "V." :op3 "Putin")
            :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG1 (c / country :wiki "Russia"
                        :name (n2 / name :op1 "Russia"))
                  :ARG2 (m / minister
                        :mod (p2 / prime))))
      :ARG1 (s2 / start-01
            :ARG1 (w / war)))

                  :location (g / ground))
            :op2 (l2 / limit-01
                  :ARG1 c2
                  :ARG2 (f / fight-01
                        :ARG0 (b / between
                              :op1 (s2 / separatist)
                              :op2 (f2 / force
                                    :mod c4)))))
      :time (l / late
            :op1 (d / date-entity :day 8 :month 8 :year 2008)))

      :op1 (i / international)
      :op2 (t / telecom)
      :op3 (t2 / technology)

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20080919_0209.4 ::date 2013-08-05T11:18:05 ::snt-type summary ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Iranian News Agency Fars stated that hackers known as group XP defaced or blocked 100s of Shiite-related websites.
# ::save-date Tue Mar 17, 2015 ::file PROXY_NYT_ENG_20080919_0209_4.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (p / publication :wiki "Fars_News_Agency" :name (n / name :op1 "Fars" :op2 "News" :op3 "Agency")
            :mod (c / country :wiki "Iran" :name (n2 / name :op1 "Iran")))
      :ARG1 (o / or
            :op1 (d / deface-01
                  :ARG0 (p2 / person
                        :ARG0-of (h / hack-04)
                        :ARG1-of (k / know-02
                              :ARG2 (g / group :wiki - :name (n3 / name :op1 "XP"))))
                  :ARG1 (w / website
                        :ARG1-of (r / relate-01
                              :ARG2 (r2 / religious-group :wiki "Shia_Islam" :name (n4 / name :op1 "Shiite")))
                        :quant (m / multiple :op1 100)))
            :op1 (b / block-01
                  :ARG0 p2
                  :ARG1 w)))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20080919_0209.5 ::date 2013-08-05T11:51:21 ::snt-type summary ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The official website of Iraq's Shiite leader the Grand Ayatollah Ali al-Sistani was among the websites defaced and blocked.
# ::save-date Wed Aug 7, 2013 ::file PROXY_NYT_ENG_20080919_0209_5.txt
(i / include-91
      :ARG1 (w / website
            :mod (o / official)
            :poss (p / person :wiki "Ali_al-Sistani"
                  :name (n / name :op1 "Grand" :op2 "Ayatollah" :op3 "Ali" :op4 "al-Sistani")
                  :ARG0-of (l / lead-02
                        :ARG1 (r / religious-group :wiki "Shia_Islam"
                              :name (n2 / name :op1 "Shiite")))
                  :poss (c / country :wiki "Iraq"
                        :name (n3 / name :op1 "Iraq"))))
      :ARG2 (w2 / website
            :ARG1-of (d / deface-01)
            :ARG1-of (b / block-01)))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20080919_0209.6 ::date 2013-08-05T12:16:54 ::snt-type summary ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Group XP stated on the defaced website that any website that contained material contrary to Sunni teachings would be hacked.
# ::save-date Mon Aug 5, 2013 ::file PROXY_NYT_ENG_20080919_0209_6.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (g / group :wiki -
            :name (n / name :op1 "XP"))
      :ARG1 (h / hack-04
            :ARG1 (w / website
                  :ARG0-of (c / contain-01
                        :ARG1 (m / material
                              :ARG1-of (c2 / contrary-01
                                    :ARG2 (t / teach-01
                                          :mod (r / religious-group :wiki "Sunni_Islam"
                                                :name (n2 / name :op1 "Sunni"))))))
                  :mod (a / any)))
      :medium (w2 / website
            :ARG1-of (d / deface-01)))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20080919_0209.7 ::date 2013-08-05T12:25:43 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The official website of Iraq's Shiite religious leader the Grand Ayatollah Ali al-Sistani was defaced and blocked in a sectarian-motivated cyber attack on Shiite-related sites.
# ::save-date Fri Sep 20, 2013 ::file PROXY_NYT_ENG_20080919_0209_7.txt
(a / and
      :op1 (d / deface-01
            :ARG1 (w / website
                  :poss (p / person :wiki "Ali_al-Sistani"
                        :name (n / name :op1 "Grand" :op2 "Ayatollah" :op3 "Ali" :op4 "al-Sistani")
                        :ARG0-of (l / lead-02
                              :ARG1 (r / religious-group :wiki "Shia_Islam"
                                    :name (n2 / name :op1 "Shiite")))
                        :mod (r2 / religion)
                        :poss (c / country :wiki "Iraq"
                              :name (n3 / name :op1 "Iraq")))
                  :mod (o / official))
            :ARG2 (a2 / attack-01
                  :ARG1 (s2 / site
                        :ARG1-of (r3 / relate-01
                              :ARG2 r))
                  :mod (c2 / cyber)
                  :ARG2-of (m / motivate-01
                        :ARG0 (s / sectarian))))
      :op2 (b / block-01
            :ARG1 w
            :ARG2 a2))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20080919_0209.8 ::date 2013-08-05T12:42:07 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20080919_0209.9 ::date 2013-08-05T12:46:41 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                  :name (n / name :op1 "Al-Sistani")))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20080919_0209.10 ::date 2013-08-05T13:04:39 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Another website related to 1 of Al-Sistani's religious organizations, www.al-shia.com, was also affected.
# ::save-date Wed Aug 7, 2013 ::file PROXY_NYT_ENG_20080919_0209_10.txt
(a / affect-01
      :ARG1 (w / website
            :ARG1-of (r / relate-01
                  :ARG2 (o / organization :quant 1
                        :mod (r2 / religion)
                        :ARG1-of (i / include-91
                              :ARG2 (o2 / organization
                                    :mod r2
                                    :poss (p / person :wiki "Ali_al-Sistani"
                                          :name (n / name :op1 "Al-Sistani"))))))
            :mod (u / url-entity :value "www.al-shia.com")
            :mod (a2 / another))
      :mod (a3 / also))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20080919_0209.11 ::date 2013-08-05T12:54:58 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt An alternative address, www.sistani.com, was still operational.
# ::save-date Mon Aug 5, 2013 ::file PROXY_NYT_ENG_20080919_0209_11.txt
(o / operate-01
      :ARG1 (a / address
            :mod (u / url-entity :value "www.sistani.com")
            :mod (a2 / alternative))
      :mod (s / still))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20080919_0209.12 ::date 2013-08-06T09:20:29 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Iranian News Agency Fars stated that group XP had blocked access to approximately 300 Shiite-related sites on 18 September 2008 and 19 September 2008.
# ::save-date Fri Jan 17, 2014 ::file PROXY_NYT_ENG_20080919_0209_12.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (p / publication :wiki "Fars_News_Agency"
            :name (n / name :op1 "Fars" :op2 "News" :op3 "Agency")
            :mod (c / country :wiki "Iran"
                  :name (n4 / name :op1 "Iran")))
      :ARG1 (b / block-01
            :ARG0 (g / group :wiki -
                  :name (n2 / name :op1 "XP"))
            :ARG1 (a / access-01
                  :ARG1 (s2 / site
                        :ARG1-of (r / relate-01
                              :ARG2 (r2 / religious-group :wiki "Shia_Islam"
                                    :name (n3 / name :op1 "Shiite")))
                        :quant (a2 / approximately :op1 300)))
            :time (a3 / and
                  :op1 (d / date-entity :year 2008 :month 9 :day 18)
                  :op2 (d2 / date-entity :year 2008 :month 9 :day 19))))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20080919_0209.13 ::date 2013-08-06T09:28:11 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Neither the hacking claim nor an Iranian assertion that group XP was based in the United Arab Emirates could be verified independently.
# ::save-date Wed Aug 7, 2013 ::file PROXY_NYT_ENG_20080919_0209_13.txt
(p / possible-01 :polarity -
      :ARG1 (v / verify-01
            :ARG1 (a / and
                  :op1 (c / claim-01
                        :ARG1 (h / hack-04))
                  :op2 (a2 / assert-03
                        :ARG0 (c2 / country :wiki "Iran"
                              :name (n / name :op1 "Iran"))
                        :ARG1 (b / base-01
                              :ARG1 (g / group :wiki -
                                    :name (n2 / name :op1 "XP"))
                              :location (c3 / country :wiki "United_Arab_Emirates"
                                    :name (n3 / name :op1 "United" :op2 "Arab" :op3 "Emirates")))))
            :manner (i / independent)))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20080919_0209.14 ::date 2013-08-05T13:31:42 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Several Iranian news sites stated on 19 September 2008 that many of the Shiite and Iran-related web sites that had been attacked were running normally again.
# ::save-date Fri Jul 24, 2015 ::file PROXY_NYT_ENG_20080919_0209_14.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (s2 / site
            :mod (n / news)
            :mod (c / country :wiki "Iran" :name (n2 / name :op1 "Iran"))
            :quant (s3 / several))
      :ARG1 (r / run-01
            :ARG1 (s4 / site
                  :ARG1-of (r2 / relate-01
                        :ARG2 (a / and
                              :op1 (r3 / religious-group :wiki "Shia_Islam" :name (n3 / name :op1 "Shiite"))
                              :op2 c))
                  :mod (w / web)
                  :quant (m / many)
                  :ARG1-of (a2 / attack-01))
            :ARG1-of (n4 / normal-02)
            :mod (a3 / again))
      :time (d / date-entity :year 2008 :month 9 :day 19))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20081008_0040.17 ::date 2013-08-07T02:50:26 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :ARG0 (p / pirate

                  :ARG1 (s2 / ship

                              :name (n / name :op1 "Ukraine")))))

                        :poss s4

                              :ARG1 s4))

                        :ARG0-of (s3 / sail-01)
                        :ARG0-of b2))
            :time (r2 / receive-01
                  :ARG1 (p3 / pay-01
                        :ARG1 (a2 / and
                              :op1 (d2 / dollar
                                    :mod (c3 / country :wiki "United_States"
                                          :name (n2 / name :op1 "United" :op2 "States")))
                              :op2 (p5 / prefer-01
                                    :ARG0 p
                                    :ARG1 (b3 / bill
                                          :mod (m2 / monetary-quantity :quant 100
                                                :unit (d3 / dollar)))))))))

                                    :name (n / name :op1 "Ukraine")))))))

                                    :mod (c3 / clandestine))))))
      :mod (s3 / subsequent))

                  :name (n3 / name :op1 "Afghanistan"))

                        :mod (s2 / so)))
            :time (y / year
                  :mod (r / recent))

                  :ARG1 (a / and
                        :op1 (c3 / cut-back-05
                              :ARG0 (c4 / criminal-organization :wiki "Taliban"
                                    :name (n4 / name :op1 "Taliban"))

                                    :ARG1 (p4 / poppy)))

                              :ARG0 c4

                                    :mod (r2 / raw)))
                        :purpose (e / effort
                              :purpose (a2 / and
                                    :op1 (s4 / support-01

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20081128_0005.9 ::date 2013-08-07T04:14:45 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The United Nations found that the result was a 19 percent reduction in the amount of land devoted to opium in Afghanistan even though the total tonnage of opium produced dropped by just 6 percent.
# ::save-date Fri Sep 20, 2013 ::file PROXY_NYT_ENG_20081128_0005_9.txt
(f / find-01
      :ARG0 (o / organization :wiki "United_Nations"
            :name (n / name :op1 "United" :op2 "Nations"))
      :ARG1 (r2 / result-01
            :ARG1 (r / reduce-01
                  :ARG1 (a2 / amount
                        :quant-of (l / land
                              :ARG1-of (d / devote-01
                                    :ARG2 (o2 / opium)
                                    :location (c / country :wiki "Afghanistan"
                                          :name (n2 / name :op1 "Afghanistan")))))
                  :ARG2 (p3 / percentage-entity :value 19)
                  :concession (d2 / drop-01
                        :ARG1 (t / tonnage
                              :quant-of (o3 / opium

# ::snt South Africa's Foreign Military Assistance Act means that no person is allowed to offer military assistance to any State, organ of State, group or other country, unless permission is granted by the National Conventional Arms Control Committee.
# ::save-date Thu Mar 12, 2015 ::file PROXY_XIN_ENG_20011006_0073_12.txt

      :ARG1 (l / law :wiki - :name (n / name :op1 "Foreign" :op2 "Military" :op3 "Assistance" :op4 "Act")

            :ARG1 (o / offer-01
                  :ARG0 (p / person)

                        :mod (m2 / military))
                  :ARG3 (o3 / or
                        :op1 (s / state)
                        :op2 (o2 / organ

                        :op4 (c2 / country
                              :mod (o4 / other))
                        :mod (a3 / any)))

                  :ARG0 (g3 / government-organization :wiki - :name (n3 / name :op1 "National" :op2 "Conventional" :op3 "Arms" :op4 "Control" :op5 "Committee"))

                        :name (n3 / name :op1 "Guangdong"))

                        :ARG1 (i / intelligence)))

            :ARG0 p

                        :part-of (s / series))

                                    :time (f / former))
                              :ARG1-of (r / rank-01
                                    :ARG1-of (h2 / high-02))))
                  :ARG1-of (d2 / disclose-01
                        :time (d3 / date-entity :year 2002 :month 7 :day 25)))
            :ARG1 (l / link-01
                  :ARG1 (t / traffic-01
                        :ARG1 (d4 / drug))))
      :op2 (p / possible-01
            :ARG1 (c2 / compromise-02
                  :ARG0 d
                  :ARG1 (s2 / situation
                        :poss (p2 / person :wiki "Vladimiro_Montesinos" :name (n2 / name :op1 "Vladimiro" :op2 "Montesinos")
                              :ARG0-of (h4 / head-01
                                    :ARG1 (g / government-organization :wiki "National_Intelligence_Service_(Peru)" :name (n3 / name :op1 "National" :op2 "Intelligence" :op3 "Service")
                                          :poss c)
                                    :time (f3 / former))))
                  :degree (f2 / further))))

# ::save-date Thu May 28, 2015 ::file PROXY_XIN_ENG_20021123_0156_16.txt

      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (s3 / strengthen-01
                  :ARG0 s2
                  :ARG1 (s4 / sense-02
                        :mod (c2 / common)
                        :mod (p / politics))
                  :topic c)
            :op2 (r2 / regard-01
                  :ARG0 s2
                  :ARG1 c
                  :ARG2 (p2 / problem
                        :mod (s5 / strategy)
                        :ARG0-of (a3 / affect-01
                              :ARG1 (a4 / and
                                    :op1 (s6 / security
                                          :mod (r3 / region))
                                    :op2 (d / develop-02
                                          :ARG1 (o2 / organization :wiki "Shanghai_Cooperation_Organisation" :name (n / name :op1 "SCO"))))
                              :ARG1-of (p3 / possible-01)))))
      :ARG2 (s2 / state
            :mod (a2 / all)
            :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG2 (m / member)))
      :purpose (g / gain-02
            :ARG0 s3
            :ARG1 (b / benefit
                  :mod (s / substantial))
            :ARG2 (c / cooperate-01
                  :ARG2 (a5 / and
                        :op1 (e / economy)
                        :op2 (t / trade-01)))))

                              :ARG1 p
                              :ARG2 (b / biology)))))
      :ARG1 (p2 / plant
            :mod (j / juice :wiki -
                  :name (n3 / name :op1 "Yaffa")
                  :poss (c3 / company :wiki -
                        :name (n4 / name :op1 "National" :op2 "Food" :op3 "Industries" :op4 "Co.")
                        :location (c2 / city-district :wiki -
                              :name (n6 / name :op1 "Zafaraniyah")

                                    :mod (i / industry))

                  :op2 (t2 / travel-01

                        :ARG2 c)
                  :frequency (n3 / number))))

                  :mod (n2 / need-01)
                  :mod (a3 / all)))

            :ARG0 g

                                    :op1 (e2 / economy)
                                    :op2 (f / field
                                          :mod (o5 / other)))))
                  :op2 (p / promote-02
                        :ARG0 a
                        :ARG1 (r2 / relation-03
                              :ARG0 o2
                              :ARG2 (a4 / and
                                    :op1 (c5 / country
                                          :mod (o3 / other))
                                    :op2 (o4 / organization
                                          :mod (i / international)))))
                  :op3 (s2 / strengthen-01
                        :ARG0 a
                        :ARG1 (r3 / role
                              :poss o2
                              :purpose (m2 / maintain-01
                                    :ARG1 (a5 / and
                                          :op1 (a8 / and
                                                :op1 (p3 / peace
                                                      :mod (r4 / region))
                                                :op2 (p4 / peace
                                                      :mod (g2 / globe)))
                                          :op2 (a9 / and
                                                :op1 (d / develop-02
                                                      :mod (r5 / region))
                                                :op2 (d2 / develop-02
                                                      :mod (g / globe))))))))
            :mod (a2 / also)))

                  :quant (m / more-than
                        :op1 (m2 / monetary-quantity :quant 480000000
                              :unit (d2 / dollar))))
            :time (d3 / date-interval
                  :op1 (d4 / date-entity :year 1990)
                  :op2 (d5 / date-entity :year 2003))

                  :op1 (r / reduce-01
                        :ARG1 (p / poverty))
                  :op2 (d6 / develop-02
                        :ARG1 (a3 / agriculture))
                  :op3 (h / healthcare)
                  :op4 (r2 / reform-01
                        :ARG1 (e / economy))
                  :mod (p2 / primary)))
      :ARG3 (g3 / government-organization
            :ARG0-of (g4 / govern-01
                  :ARG1 (c2 / country :wiki "Vietnam" :name (n2 / name :op1 "Vietnam")))))

                                    :mod (a4 / all))
                              :ARG1-of (e / efficient-01))))))

                                    :mod (v / vice)))))

                  :mod (r / recent))))

                        :ARG1 (d / develop-02

                                          :name (n2 / name :op1 "Thailand"))
                                    :op2 (c5 / country :wiki "China"
                                          :name (n3 / name :op1 "China")))

                                                :mod (v / various)))

                                          :ARG2 (t2 / trade-01)
                                          :mod f))
                              :degree (f2 / further))))))

# ::id nw.chtb_0303.2 ::date 2012-11-28T21:53:30 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Fri Jul 17, 2015 ::file nw_chtb_0303_2.txt

      :ARG0 (p / person :wiki - :name (n / name :op1 "Guofang" :op2 "Shen")
            :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG1 (g4 / government-organization :wiki "Ministry_of_Foreign_Affairs_of_the_People's_Republic_of_China" :name (n2 / name :op1 "Foreign" :op2 "Ministry"))
                  :ARG2 (s / spokesperson)))
      :ARG1 (v / visit-01
            :ARG0 (p2 / person :wiki "rpd_Gncz" :name (n3 / name :op1 "Gentzs" :op2 "Aerpade")
                  :ARG0-of (h3 / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG1 (c3 / country :wiki "Hungary" :name (n4 / name :op1 "Hungary" :op2 "Republic"))
                        :ARG2 (p3 / president)))
            :ARG1 (c4 / country :wiki "China" :name (n5 / name :op1 "China"))
            :mod (s2 / state)
            :time (d / date-interval
                  :op1 (d2 / date-entity :month 9 :day 14)
                  :op2 (d3 / date-entity :month 9 :day 17))
            :ARG2-of (i / invite-01
                  :ARG0 (p4 / person :wiki "Jiang_Zemin" :name (n6 / name :op1 "Zemin" :op2 "Jiang")
                        :ARG0-of (h4 / have-org-role-91
                              :ARG2 (p5 / president)))))
      :time (c6 / conference
            :mod (n7 / news)
            :ARG1-of (h2 / hold-04
                  :time (a2 / afternoon
                        :mod (t / this)))))

      :ARG0 (p4 / person :wiki "John_Malecela" :name (n / name :op1 "John" :op2 "Malsela")

                  :ARG1 (c3 / country :wiki "Tanzania" :name (n2 / name :op1 "Tanzania" :op2 "United" :op3 "Republic"))

                        :op1 (p5 / premier)
                        :op2 (p6 / president
                              :mod (v2 / vice)
                              :ord (o / ordinal-entity :value 1)))))
      :ARG1 (c4 / country :wiki "China" :name (n3 / name :op1 "China"))
      :time (d / date-interval
            :op1 (d2 / date-entity :month 9 :day 9)
            :op2 (d3 / date-entity :month 9 :day 13))
      :mod (o2 / official)
      :ARG2-of (i / invite-01

                        :ARG2 (p2 / premier)))))

                              :name (n / name :op1 "China"))

      :location (h / here))

                        :ARG1 (c / country :wiki "Kyrgyzstan"
                              :name (n4 / name :op1 "Kirghizia"))

# ::id nw.chtb_0305.4 ::date 2012-12-11T22:23:38 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The six documents are : an agreement on Chinese providing a loan to the Kirghizia government , an agreement on forming a combined Economy and Trade Committee between the Sino - Kirghizian governments , an note exchange on the presenting of materials to Kirghizia by China , a cultural cooperation agreement between the two countries of China and Kirghizia , ratification letters on exchanging consular treaties between the two countries , an agreement on cooperating on the China Trade Promotion Council and the Kirghizian Chamber of Industry and Commerce .
# ::save-date Fri Jan 3, 2014 ::file nw_chtb_0305_4.txt
(i / include-91
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (a2 / agree-01
                  :ARG1 (l / loan-01
                        :ARG0 (p2 / person
                              :mod c7)
                        :ARG2 (g2 / government-organization
                              :ARG0-of (g3 / govern-01
                                    :ARG1 (c5 / country :wiki "Kyrgyzstan"
                                          :name (n4 / name :op1 "Kirghizia"))))))
            :op2 (a3 / agree-01
                  :ARG1 (f / form-01
                        :ARG0 (a4 / and
                              :op1 (g5 / government-organization
                                    :ARG0-of (g6 / govern-01
                                          :ARG1 (c7 / country :wiki "China"
                                                :name (n6 / name :op1 "China"))))
                              :op2 (g7 / government-organization
                                    :ARG0-of (g8 / govern-01
                                          :ARG1 c5)))
                        :ARG1 (g4 / government-organization :wiki -
                              :name (n5 / name :op1 "Economy" :op2 "and" :op3 "Trade" :op4 "Committee")
                              :ARG3-of (c6 / combine-01))))
            :op3 (e2 / exchange-01
                  :mod (n7 / note)
                  :topic (p3 / present-01
                        :ARG0 c7
                        :ARG1 (m / material)
                        :ARG2 c5))
            :op4 (a5 / agree-01
                  :ARG0 (a6 / and
                        :op1 c7
                        :op2 c5)
                  :ARG1 (c8 / cooperate-01
                        :ARG0 c7
                        :ARG1 (c9 / culture)
                        :ARG2 c5))
            :op5 (l2 / letter
                  :ARG0-of (r / ratify-01)
                  :topic (e3 / exchange-01
                        :ARG0 c7
                        :ARG1 (t / treaty
                              :mod (c10 / consul))
                        :ARG2 c5))
            :op6 (a7 / agree-01
                  :ARG1 (c11 / cooperate-01
                        :ARG2 (a8 / and
                              :op1 (g9 / government-organization :wiki "China_Council_for_the_Promotion_of_International_Trade"
                                    :name (n8 / name :op1 "Trade" :op2 "Promotion" :op3 "Council")
                                    :poss c7)
                              :op2 (g10 / government-organization :wiki -
                                    :name (n9 / name :op1 "Chamber" :op2 "of" :op3 "Industry" :op4 "and" :op5 "Commerce")
                                    :poss c5)))))
      :ARG2 (d / document :quant 6))

            :op1 (c2 / ceremony
                  :mod (s / sign-01))))

            :op1 (s2 / sportsman)

                  :ARG0-of (c / coach-01))
            :op3 (d / doctor)
            :op4 (n / nurse)

                  :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG1 (d2 / delegation)
                        :ARG2 (o2 / official))))
      :location (b / below
            :op1 (s3 / stage))
      :manner (n2 / neat))

                                    :poss (f / friendly-01
                                          :mod (i / international))))))))

# ::id nw.chtb_0322.12 ::date 2012-12-29T14:34:48 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :ARG2 (p / perform-01
            :ARG0 (t / team
                  :mod (c3 / country :wiki "China"
                        :name (n / name :op1 "China")))
            :manner (g2 / good
                  :degree (m2 / more))
            :ARG0-of (c6 / cause-01
                  :ARG1 (w / win-01
                        :ARG0 t))
            :time (t2 / today)))

# ::id nw.chtb_0322.17 ::date 2012-12-29T15:48:41 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt According to the rules discussed and agreed upon by both sides , if the two teams draw with 7 : 7 , then the final result will be determined by the result of the competition between Weiping Nie of the Chinese team and Xunxuan Cao of the Korean team .
# ::save-date Fri Jan 3, 2014 ::file nw_chtb_0322_17.txt
(d2 / determine-01
      :ARG0 (t4 / thing
            :ARG2-of (r3 / result-01
                  :ARG1 (c4 / compete-01
                        :ARG0 (p3 / person :wiki "Nie_Weiping"
                              :name (n / name :op1 "Weiping" :op2 "Nie")
                              :part-of (t / team
                                    :mod (c5 / country :wiki "China"
                                          :name (n2 / name :op1 "China"))))
                        :ARG1 (p4 / person :wiki -
                              :name (n3 / name :op1 "XunXuan" :op2 "Cao")
                              :part-of (t2 / team
                                    :mod (c6 / country :wiki "Korea"
                                          :name (n4 / name :op1 "Korea")))))))
      :ARG1 (r2 / result-01
            :mod (f / final))
      :condition (d3 / draw-00
            :ARG0 t
            :ARG1 t2
            :quant (s / score-entity :op1 7 :op2 7))
      :ARG1-of (c / conform-01
            :ARG2 (r / rule
                  :ARG1-of (d / discuss-01
                        :ARG0 (s2 / side
                              :mod (b / both)))
                  :ARG1-of (a / agree-01
                        :ARG0 s2))))

                        :ARG0-of (w / win-01

            :ord (o2 / ordinal-entity :value 2)))

# ::id nw.chtb_0325.6 ::date 2012-12-29T22:32:54 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Her performance was 303.00 points .
# ::save-date Tue Dec 17, 2013 ::file nw_chtb_0325_6.txt
(p2 / point :quant 303.00
      :domain (p / perform-01
            :ARG0 (s / she)))

# ::id nw.chtb_0325.7 ::date 2012-12-29T22:33:34 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt In the preliminary men 's 1 - meter platform diving competition this morning , our competitors Lan Wei and Sheng Chen have already gained rights to the heats .
# ::save-date Wed Apr 29, 2015 ::file nw_chtb_0325_7.txt
(g / gain-02
      :ARG0 (a / and
            :op1 (p3 / person :wiki "Lan_Wei" :name (n / name :op1 "Lan" :op2 "Wei"))
            :op2 (p4 / person :wiki - :name (n2 / name :op1 "Sheng" :op2 "Chen"))
            :ARG0-of (c / compete-01
                  :ARG1 (w / we)))
      :ARG1 (r / right-05
            :ARG1 a
            :ARG2 (h / heat))
      :time (c2 / compete-01
            :mod (p5 / preliminary)
            :mod (d2 / dive-01
                  :ARG0 (m2 / man)
                  :mod (p6 / platform
                        :mod (d3 / distance-quantity :quant 1
                              :unit (m3 / meter)))))
      :time (m4 / morning
            :mod (t / this))
      :time (a2 / already))

# ::id nw.chtb_0325.8 ::date 2012-12-29T22:42:24 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The results of today 's preliminary women 's water - polo competition are : the Hungarian team defeated the Canadian team by 13 : 7 , the French team defeated the Brazilian team by 10 : 9 , the Australian team defeated the German team by 10 : 8 , the Russian team defeated the Dutch team by 7 : 6 , the US team defeated the Kazakhstani team by 10 : 5 , and the Italian team defeated the New Zealand team by 12 : 2 .
# ::save-date Tue Dec 17, 2013 ::file nw_chtb_0325_8.txt
(r2 / result-01
      :ARG1 (c13 / compete-01
            :ARG0 (w / woman)
            :mod (p / preliminary)
            :time (t / today)
            :mod (p14 / polo
                  :mod (w2 / water)))
      :ARG2 (a2 / and
            :op1 (d / defeat-01
                  :ARG0 (t2 / team
                        :mod (c14 / country :wiki "Hungary"
                              :name (n5 / name :op1 "Hungary")))
                  :ARG1 (t3 / team
                        :mod (c15 / country :wiki "Canada"
                              :name (n6 / name :op1 "Canada")))
                  :quant (s / score-entity :op1 13 :op2 7))
            :op2 (d2 / defeat-01
                  :ARG0 (t4 / team
                        :mod (c16 / country :wiki "France"
                              :name (n7 / name :op1 "France")))
                  :ARG1 (t5 / team
                        :mod (c17 / country :wiki "Brazil"
                              :name (n8 / name :op1 "Brazil")))
                  :quant (s2 / score-entity :op1 10 :op2 9))
            :op3 (d3 / defeat-01
                  :ARG0 (t6 / team
                        :mod (c18 / country :wiki "Australia"
                              :name (n9 / name :op1 "Australia")))
                  :ARG1 (t7 / team
                        :mod (c19 / country :wiki "Germany"
                              :name (n10 / name :op1 "Germany")))
                  :quant (s3 / score-entity :op1 10 :op2 8))
            :op4 (d4 / defeat-01
                  :ARG0 (t8 / team
                        :mod (c20 / country :wiki "Russia"
                              :name (n11 / name :op1 "Russia")))
                  :ARG1 (t9 / team
                        :mod (c21 / country :wiki "Netherlands"
                              :name (n12 / name :op1 "Netherlands")))
                  :quant (s4 / score-entity :op1 7 :op2 6))
            :op5 (d5 / defeat-01
                  :ARG0 (t10 / team
                        :mod (c22 / country :wiki "United_States"
                              :name (n13 / name :op1 "United" :op2 "States")))
                  :ARG1 (t11 / team
                        :mod (c23 / country :wiki "Kazakhstan"
                              :name (n14 / name :op1 "Kazakhstan")))
                  :quant (s5 / score-entity :op1 10 :op2 5))
            :op6 (d6 / defeat-01
                  :ARG0 (t12 / team
                        :mod (c24 / country :wiki "Italy"
                              :name (n15 / name :op1 "Italy")))
                  :ARG1 (t13 / team
                        :mod (c25 / country :wiki "New_Zealand"
                              :name (n16 / name :op1 "New" :op2 "Zealand")))
                  :quant (s6 / score-entity :op1 12 :op2 2))))

# ::id nw.chtb_0325.9 ::date 2012-12-29T22:52:27 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt There are 12 teams totally participating in the competition .
# ::save-date Sun Jan 12, 2014 ::file nw_chtb_0325_9.txt
(p / participate-01
      :ARG0 (t / team
            :quant (x / 12
                  :ARG2-of (t2 / total-01
                        :ARG1 t)))
      :ARG1 (c / compete-01))

# ::id nw.chtb_0325.10 ::date 2012-12-29T22:53:20 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt ( End )
# ::save-date Sat Dec 29, 2012 ::file nw_chtb_0325_10.txt
(e / end-01)
